name: URLSessionStreamDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines methods that URL session instances call on their delegates to handle task-level events specific to stream tasks.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, betterRouteDiscoveredFor: URLSessionStreamTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a better route to the host has been detected for the stream.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, streamTask: URLSessionStreamTask, didBecome: InputStream, outputStream: OutputStream)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the stream task has been completed as a result of the stream task calling the captureStreams() method.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, readClosedFor: URLSessionStreamTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the read side of the underlying socket has been closed.

items.name: func urlSession(URLSession, writeClosedFor: URLSessionStreamTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the write side of the underlying socket has been closed.
